allow:
Bash(git tag -a v0.1.1 -m "Release v0.1.1

New Features:
- Add ''cw start'' command as user-friendly alias for starting daemon
- Add ''cw stop'' command to gracefully stop the daemon

Improvements:
- Better CLI ergonomics with intuitive start/stop commands
- Backward compatible - ''cw daemon'' still works

Performance & Reliability \(from v0.1.0\):
- Lock-free DashMap architecture \(85% thread reduction\)
- Event-driven persistence \(write only on state changes\)
- Comprehensive error handling and logging
- Windows support added to releases
")

Bash(git tag -a v0.1.1 -m "Release v0.1.1

New Features:
- Add ''cw start'' command as user-friendly alias for starting daemon
- Add ''cw stop'' command to gracefully stop the daemon

Improvements:
- Better CLI ergonomics with intuitive start/stop commands
- Backward compatible - ''cw daemon'' still works

Bug Fixes:
- Fix missing protocol variants \(SendInput, GetStatus, WatchSession\)

Performance & Reliability:
- Lock-free DashMap architecture \(85% thread reduction\)
- Event-driven persistence \(write only on state changes\)
- Comprehensive error handling and logging
- Windows support added to releases
")
Bash(git -C /Users/noel/src/sonica/codewire diff .github/workflows/ci.yml src/client.rs src/daemon.rs src/main.rs src/session.rs src/terminal.rs tests/integration.rs)
